name: When I Die
storyline:
The massacre has begun. There is only two options left. To survive or suffer.

In the Labs of Bitlyx Pharmaceuticals, the crisis started. They kept it down under their powers. But, not for long.

This is a stand-alone survival horror thriller game comes with a post-apocalyptic story line. The setting of the game originally took place in a facility. The player need to complete a role of a remaining survivor trapped in the building trying to escape from the people who have become zombies. Player must be protected in the process and Have to use limited resources with proper strategy.

You are the sole survivor around here. only thing you know is, there is a danger, and you must survive. First of all you have to get out of this place.
